Ahmad Maher bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri si Ijipt

Oge izizi ya dị ka onye nduzi ya n'ihe nkiri The Traveller (2009) sonyere maka Golden Lion na 66th Venice International Film Festival. E gosipụtakwara ya na ngalaba Special Presentations na 2009 Toronto International Film Festival. Maher rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na ihe nkiri Martin Scorsese nke 1990 Goodfellas
